1.label: On/Off Toggle Orientation
1.description: Normal mode: Toggle up turns the light on, toggle down turns the light off. Reverse mode: Toggle up turns the light off, toggle down turns the light on. Toggle mode: Either direction toggles the light.

options.label: Toggle up to turn the light on, toggle down to turn it off (default)
Toggle up to turn the light off, toggle down to turn it on
Toggle up or down to turn light on/off (change state)

3.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer
3.description: Use this parameter to enable or disable the auto turn-off timer function.

options.label: Timer disabled (default)
Timer enabled

4.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Duration
4.description: Time, in minutes, for auto-off timer delay.

5.label: Auto Turn-On Timer
5.description: Use this parameter to enable or disable the auto turn-on timer function.

options.label: Timer disabled (default)
Timer enabled

6.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Duration
6.description: Set the time (in minutes) after which you want the switch to automatically turn on once it has been turned off.

7.label: Association Reports
7.description: Choose which physical and Z-Wave triggers should prompt the switch to send a status change report to associated devices.

options.label: None
Physical tap on ZEN23 only
Physical tap on connected 3-way switch only
Physical tap on ZEN23 or connected 3-way switch
Z-Wave command from hub
Physical tap on ZEN23 or Z-Wave command from hub
Physical tap on connected 3-way switch or Z-Wave command from hub
Physical tap on ZEN23 / connected 3-way switch or Z-Wave command from hub
Timer only
Physical tap on ZEN23 or timer
Physical tap on connected 3-way switch or timer
Physical tap on ZEN23 / connected 3-way switch or timer
Z-Wave command from hub or timer
Physical tap on ZEN23, Z-Wave command from hub, or timer
Physical tap on ZEN23 / connected 3-way switch, Z-Wave command from hub, or timer
All of the above. (default)

8.label: On Off Status After Power Failure

options.label: Off
On
Restore

9.label: Enable/Disable Scene Control
9.description: Enable or disable scene control functionality for quick double tap triggers.

options.label: Scene control disabled (default).
Scene Control enabled

11.label: Smart Bulb Mode: Enable/Disable Paddle / Z-Wave Control
11.description: Enable or disable manual on/off control. If enabled, youâ€™ll only be able to control the connected light via Z-Wave. Scenes and other functionality will still be available through the physical switch.

options.label: Physical toggle control disabled.
Physical toggle control enabled (default).
Physical toggle and Z-Wave control disabled. NOTE: toggle the switch up 10 times quickly to change this mode.

13.label: Reporting behavior with disabled physical control
13.description: Set reporting behavior for disabled physical control.

options.label: Switch reports on/off status and changes LED indicator state even if physical and Z-Wave control is disabled (default)
Switch doesn't report on/off status or change LED indicator state when physical (and Z-Wave) control is disabled

19.label: 3-Way Switch Type
19.description: Choose the type of 3-way switch you want to use in a 3-way set-up.

options.label: Regular mechanical 3-way on/off switch, use the connected 3-way switch to turn the light on or off (default)
Momentary switch, click once to change status (light on or off).
